verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> A Song הַֽמַּֽעֲל֗וֹת <WH4609> of degrees לִשְׁלֹ֫מֹ֥ה <WH8010> for Solomon אִם־ <WH518> lo יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> Except the LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִבְנֶ֬ה <WH1129> build בַ֗יִת <WH1004> the house שָׁ֤וְא ׀ <WH7723> in vain עָמְל֣וּ <WH5998> they labour בוֹנָ֣יו <WH1129> that build בּ֑וֹ אִם־ <WH518> lo יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> it except the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִשְׁמָר־ <WH8104> keep עִ֝֗יר <WH5892> the city שָׁ֤וְא ׀ <WH7723> [but] in vain שָׁקַ֬ד <WH8245> waketh שׁוֹמֵֽר׃ <WH8104> the watchman

שָׁ֤וְא <WH7723> [It is] vain לָכֶ֨ם ׀ מַשְׁכִּ֪ימֵי <WH7925> early ק֡וּם <WH6965> for you to rise up מְאַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH309> late שֶׁ֗בֶת <WH3427> to sit up אֹ֭כְלֵי <WH398> to eat לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> the bread הָעֲצָבִ֑ים <WH6089> of sorrows כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> after that יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> [for] so he giveth לִֽידִיד֣וֹ <WH3039> his beloved שֵׁנָֽא׃ <WH8142> sleep

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold נַחֲלַ֣ת <WH5159> [are] an heritage יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD בָּנִ֑ים <WH1121> Lo children שָׂ֝כָ֗ר <WH7939> [is his] reward פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> [and] the fruit הַבָּֽטֶן׃ <WH990> of the womb
כְּחִצִּ֥ים <WH2671> As arrows בְּיַד־ <WH3027> [are] in the hand גִּבּ֑וֹר <WH1368> of a mighty man כֵּ֝֗ן <WH3651> So בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> so [are] children הַנְּעוּרִֽים׃ <WH5271> of the youth

אַשְׁרֵ֤י <WH835> Happy הַגֶּ֗בֶר <WH1397> [is] the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whose מִלֵּ֥א <WH4390> full אֶת־ <WH853> אַשְׁפָּת֗וֹ <WH827> that hath his quiver מֵ֫הֶ֥ם <WH1992> like לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <WH954> of them they shall not be ashamed כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יְדַבְּר֖וּ <WH1696> but they shall speak אֶת־ <WH854> with אוֹיְבִ֣ים <WH341> with the enemies בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ <WH8179> in the gate
